# speed

**Instance Property**

The instantaneous velocity of the device, measured in meters per second.

## Declaration

```swift
var speed: CLLocationSpeed { get }
```

## Getting speed and slope

- **slope**: The slope at the location toward the direction of travel, measured in degrees.
- **maxAbsSlope**: The maximum absolute slope at the location toward all directions, measured in degrees.
